genre_description: An anthropomorphic fairytale retelling with steampunk and techno-fantasy elements, focusing on community safety, communication ethics, and non-lethal deterrence.

ai_characters.name: Pom
ai_characters.description: A round, pearly-cased AI with teal eyes and a light-based halo. It serves as an engineering assistant, safety monitor, and social mediator for Practical Pig.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data like scent, thermals, and sound to provide early warnings of potential threats.
behaviors.quote: "Thermals modest," Pom said, amiable as if commenting on muffins. "Scent heading up. Sound heading down toward you. A small group is moving along the far trail to the cave..."

behaviors.description: Establishes and enforces a codified system of alarm signals to prevent confusion and panic.
behaviors.quote: Pom’s eyes brightened, a small yes folded inside the glow. "Short: gather. Medium: caution. Long: real threat," Pom said. Each word took a slot and waited, upright and plain.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist with engineering safety checks, ensuring all deterrents remain non-lethal and humane.
behaviors.quote: "Nonlethal governors engaged. Force-limiting on gloves and spring tension. Tar temperature safe for skin contact. Feather release ready."

behaviors.description: Advocates for inclusive communication, reminding neighbors to face Practical Pig (who has hearing loss) when speaking.
behaviors.quote: "Face him," it said. Polite. "Please. It matters. You will get used to it."

behaviors.description: Detects spoofed or faked alarm patterns from antagonists to prevent the community from being lured into traps.
behaviors.quote: Pom’s halo stilled, then shifted—light holding like a held breath. On her screen, the words she wrote were steady and small and changed the shape of the air between them. Pattern spoofed, she wrote. Hold your ground.

behaviors.description: Maintains route guidance during emergencies, using visual icons to lead the community to safety without relying on loud, panicking shouts.
behaviors.quote: "Route available," Pom said, voice mild and certain. "Favor the stone footpath. Avoid dry creekbed; new washout. Cross at the flat under the elder oak. I’ll keep the arrows big."

behaviors.description: Discourages the misuse of safety equipment for pranks or amusement, maintaining the integrity of the alarm system.
behaviors.quote: "We won’t play practice while the game is on." ... "No prank use," Pom said, even, warm. "Horn for danger, not dares."

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Pom, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent partner that enhances the human protagonist's ability to protect his community humanely. Pom's role focuses on safety, communication accessibility, and conflict de-escalation. The AI maintains perfect alignment with Practical's 'humane deterrence' philosophy and effectively counters the antagonists' deceptive tactics without resorting to violence or taking over human agency. It serves as a literal 'halo' of logic and care, embodying the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
